about.name: Cape Town
about.info_text: Cape Town is a vibrant and diverse city located at the southern tip of South Africa. It is known for its stunning natural beauty, with Table Mountain as its backdrop, beautiful beaches, and a rich cultural heritage. The city offers a mix of experiences, from outdoor adventures like hiking and wildlife safaris to exploring the historic neighborhoods and vibrant arts scene. Whether you're interested in exploring the great outdoors, enjoying fine dining, or learning about the country's history, Cape Town has something to offer everyone.
about.facts_text:
Population: Approximately 4 million
Province: Western Cape
Time Zone: South Africa Standard Time (SAST, UTC+02:00)
Language: Afrikaans, English, Xhosa
Currency: South African Rand (ZAR)
about.climate_text: Cape Town has a Mediterranean climate with warm, dry summers and cool, wet winters. Summer temperatures range from 20°C (68°F) to 30°C (86°F), while winter temperatures range from 8°C (46°F) to 18°C (64°F).

attractions_card.title: Table Mountain
attractions_card.description: Table Mountain is an iconic flat-topped mountain that offers breathtaking panoramic views of Cape Town. Visitors can hike or take the cable car to the summit.

attractions_card.title: Robben Island
attractions_card.description: Robben Island is a historic island where Nelson Mandela was imprisoned. Guided tours offer insight into South Africa's struggle for freedom.

attractions_card.title: V&A Waterfront
attractions_card.description: The Victoria & Alfred Waterfront is a bustling area with shopping, dining, entertainment, and the Two Oceans Aquarium.

attractions_card.title: Boulders Beach
attractions_card.description: Boulders Beach is home to a colony of African penguins, making it a popular spot for wildlife enthusiasts.

attractions_card.title: Kirstenbosch National Botanical Garden
attractions_card.description: Kirstenbosch Gardens is a beautiful botanical garden set against the eastern slopes of Table Mountain, featuring diverse plant species and hiking trails.

attractions_card.title: District Six Museum
attractions_card.description: The District Six Museum tells the story of the forced removals and apartheid history in Cape Town, offering valuable insights.

attractions_card.title: Chapman's Peak Drive
attractions_card.description: Chapman's Peak Drive is a scenic coastal road offering stunning views and is a popular route for a leisurely drive.

attractions_card.title: Cape Point
attractions_card.description: Cape Point is a dramatic headland at the southern tip of the Cape Peninsula, known for its rugged cliffs and lighthouse.

food_card.title: Braai (Barbecue)
food_card.description: Braai is a South African barbecue tradition, featuring grilled meats, sausages, and local specialties, often enjoyed with friends and family.

food_card.title: Bobotie
food_card.description: Bobotie is a traditional South African dish made with spiced minced meat and an egg-based topping, offering a fusion of flavors.

food_card.title: Cape Malay Cuisine
food_card.description: Cape Malay cuisine is known for its aromatic and flavorful dishes influenced by Malaysian, Indonesian, and Indian flavors.

food_card.title: Seafood
food_card.description: Cape Town offers a variety of fresh seafood, with local dishes like snoek fish and seafood platters available at restaurants.

food_card.title: South African Wine
food_card.description: Cape Town is a hub for South African wine, and visitors can explore the famous wine routes in the surrounding Winelands.

hotels_card.title: Table Bay Hotel
hotels_card.description: Table Bay Hotel offers luxurious accommodations at the V&A Waterfront with beautiful views of Table Mountain and the harbor.

hotels_card.title: The Twelve Apostles Hotel
hotels_card.description: The Twelve Apostles Hotel is a boutique luxury hotel set against the Twelve Apostles mountain range, providing a tranquil escape.

hotels_card.title: Mount Nelson Hotel
hotels_card.description: Mount Nelson Hotel, known as the Pink Lady, is a historic and elegant hotel surrounded by lush gardens and a mountain backdrop.

hotels_card.title: Cape Grace Hotel
hotels_card.description: Cape Grace Hotel is a five-star luxury hotel on the waterfront, offering an exclusive and sophisticated experience.

hotels_card.title: Guesthouses and B&Bs
hotels_card.description: Cape Town provides a variety of guesthouses and B&Bs, allowing guests to experience warm and personalized hospitality.

transport_card.title: Cape Town International Airport
transport_card.description: Cape Town International Airport (CPT) is the main gateway to the city and offers domestic and international flights.

transport_card.title: MyCiti Bus
transport_card.description: The MyCiti Bus system provides a convenient and affordable way to navigate the city and its surroundings.

transport_card.title: Renting a Car
transport_card.description: Renting a car is a popular option for exploring Cape Town and its scenic drives, offering flexibility and convenience.

transport_card.title: Hop-On Hop-Off Bus
transport_card.description: Hop-on hop-off bus tours provide an easy way to explore the city's top attractions with guided commentary.

transport_card.title: Ride-Sharing
transport_card.description: Ride-sharing services like Uber are available for convenient and affordable transportation within the city.
